title: cum uxores ipse et populus suus non haberent

content.question: In lines 5-6, cum uxores ipse et populus suus non haberent is translated

choices.label: after he himself and his people lost their wives
because he himself and his own people did not have wives
although he and his people themselves did not have wives
he himself and his own people were not living with their wives

content.answer: because he himself and his own people did not have wives
